display_long_description:
"Floating World" is an ocean-themed survival building game where you must find food and resources to build a shelter and survive each day. your creativity and effort will guide you through this ocean world.

The game features numerous islands, a storyline, and puzzle elements, along with a wealth of building materials and tools. You can experiment with different architectural styles and use various tools to uncover the story of this floating world. 🏝️🔍💡

Gameplay Description:
🏠🪑 Building System: Expand your activity area on the sea with a building gun. Construct houses, roofs, and eaves to create a comfortable home. 

🛥️⚙️ Navigation System: Build sails for your raft. For faster travel, construct engines and rudders to better control your journey.

🔧🔩 Synthesizer: Almost everything in the floating world can be crafted with this machine. Resources can also be recycled using it.

🎒🎮 Backpack System: Designed for VR, the backpack system allows you to store items just like in real life. 

🌱🐖 Survival Farming System: Besides basic ocean activities like fishing and grilling fish, you can also build planting pots to grow your own plants and even raise pigs on your raft.

🔨🔮 Item Upgrade System: In the later stages, build an upgrader, mining machine, and teleporter to enhance your ship and make exploring the world easier.

🎮🎨 Different Game Modes: The game offers Easy, Normal, Hard, Peaceful, and Creative modes. 

discord:
https://discord.com/invite/KTjpGAFuGE
